course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Introduction to Construction Management
course.description: This course covers the basic knowledge, skills and techniques in construction management. It entails an introduction to the construction industry, initial and feasibility studies, impact assessment, tendering process, local statutory ordinances, contract strategy and management, cost estimation and control, project finance, resource allocation, and site safety. For CIVL and CIEV students only.

reviews.author: SQ Flyer
reviews.title: 完全唔與時並進的construction management
reviews.comment_content:
時隔半年寫番個review 比下個Sem讀的朋友仔參考下

呢科算係Civil入面最容易亦都較吹水亦可以係實用的一科 基本上做civil project 係一個contract 形式下離吾開管人事管錢管時間 suppose 係應該有趣同埋可以講好多最新行業管理發展模式 不過你都知UST作爲一間美式研究型大學 一科suppose要講多D本地行業Practice 都比一個完全唔知頭唔知路的Prof 而變得D野學到最後得個Up字 同埋太US Based D Terminologies 同裏面所Introduce 的做法同概念係香港唔係個一回事 就算有部分内容接觸到香港Practice 但係都已經過曬時 我都吾知個prof同班TA 究竟對個行業有幾多認識

内容如下：
1.basic concept of construction management
2.preparing bid package
3.issues during construction phase
4.value engineering
5. construction contracts (e.g. lump sum /unit-priced contract)
6.General Condition of contracts
7.Risk allocation and liability sharing
8.meetings and negotiations
9.claims and disputes
10.legal structure
11.project funding
12.project cash flow
13. equipment ownership
14.cost estimation
15.cost control

Topic 好似好多但係實際上吾系太多 我只可以講話某部分内容概念上係實質practice叫做適用 但係個prof上堂太注重D吹水point

咁多個Topic裏面同香港practice“較”貼切係topic 6 GCC 但係已經係嚴重過時 出面街一早已經跟英國搬翻尼個套NEC principle 成十年有多 玩法步驟都變左 出面個個都有NEC3/4 PM 牌 你今時今日仲GCC 仲要上堂每個Clause 朗讀一次 唔係嘛 吾怪得UST辛辛學子對行業practice 一D認識都無 比HKU 班友直接KO 日日懞盛盛上IC原地叫春 不得不讚HKU 教management 好貼近行情 人地已經Up 好多NEC 内容 份試卷出得優秀 我地仲原地踏步甚至倒退 唔係吖嘛

結論：學construction management 我返Intern完全係學返好曬 呢個Course内容唔改革棧曬氣 出面見到UST D senior實點醒你 到你Year４揾工先泥學好 Interview準備比吖client/consultant D ah Sir玩你啦
尼緊應該到吖Jack教你地應該好彩D 畢竟2170 Jack 都講得算好同埋有行業Connection
reviews.comment_teaching:
張學清教得好一般 吾算話好又未至於好差 基本上都係讀下Notes跟著做下examples計數同玩下PRS又一堂 英文聼得到但係又細聲無氣　唯一好就係九點堂唔會講得好Chur中間放個小break播下D凄美的粵曲

tutorial就一班南亞人教都係PRS感樣又一堂

基本上UST construction management發展得差要學多D行業野最好上PG Courses或者出去intern學野去熟悉Contract 同相關Requirement
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading:
Assignment *4  24% + PRS 16%
Final Open book (MCQ, fill in the blanks, calculations) 60%

Assignment 又長又悶 叫你計一堆根本用吾著的美式數學同埋扮到好似好scenario based 感叫你draft D所謂document 實質唔係個回事 D長題目就硬要好似DSE感逼你中point先有分 每次都用唔少時間做
Final 就問得基本上無特別難度 都係問notes野跟計數填充 有D上堂教過點做

Assignment 分數比得好奇怪完全係睇你玩中吾中point或者寫成點
Final 無完全透露所有分數

但係基於内容吾係特別難 我Year2 尼上都無問題反而對你一早揾intern有幫助 同埋分擔下Year3 讀書負擔

最後B+ 比我預期爛 你睇NCTROLL發曬爛渣就知 呢科本身算得意

題外話： NCTROLL 你都精神分裂 思覺失調 話完個Course Mysterious 跟住比個dislike比professor teaching個部分係可以比A 都真係傻傻地 食錯藥
reviews.comment_workload:
基本唔大 lecture係要上係為PRS　
Notes内容都係抄書 想完整D可以參考書内容雖然書内容都係垃圾　香港用吾著
功課兩個星期一份到吾算多　其餘靠你自己溫書

Reference Textbook:
Construction Management from Wiley
General Conditions of Contract
Project Administration Handbook PAH from CEDD
New Engineering Contract 3/4 from Thomas Telford
Civil Engineering Procedures from ICE Publishing

IPRS. 4 hw. No workload and also no reward.

I suggest do not put much time on this course. It is worthless.

reviews.comment_teaching:
There is two professors teaching this course: ZHANG, Xueqing and Jack CHENG. They teach in alternate year.

As you can tell from their names, ZHANG is a mainland professor and CHENG is a Hong Kong professor. Therefore, only Jack CHENG can introduce local practices in Hong Kong in this course and therefore makes the course meaningful. REMEMBER to register in this course earilier (let says in Year 2) if you see Jack CHENG is teaching this course.

reviews.author: shirayuki653
reviews.comment_content:
This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of the construction industry, the content in this semester are as follows:

Phases of a construction project
Bid package preparation
Introduction to project feasibility study and impact assessments
Construction contracts and project delivery systems Project estimating and cost control
Project finance and appraisal
Lean construction
Construction safety

Overall speaking, the contents are quite interesting. Moreover, understanding the contents are more important than memorizing the PPT slides. Most students take this course in year 3, but it is also fine to take it on year 2 since knowledge of 2170 makes NOTHING HELPFUL for this course.Besides, the math for this course is very easy.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The instructor prepares the materials well, and he is willing to answer the questions after lectures. His PowerPoint slides are not that fancy but reader-friendly. Also, all his teaching materials are on the PowerPoint, so there is no need to find other materials for studying. There are also breaks during lectures, so the pace of the lectures is not so intense.

Tutorials are optional, the TAs will make a review for the materials covered  that week.
reviews.comment_grading:
3 Assignment(15%): not difficult to get full marks.
PRS(5%): two of them can be discounted.
Midterm(35%):59.5/70 (mean=57.3,SD about 7)
Final(45%):?(I think also slightly above mean)
Final grade: B+, I think this is lenient when comparing to the courses taken in year 2,since one got mean grades can have B at last.


Midterm allows one cheat sheet and final allows 2 cheat sheets.
Most of the exam questions are short questions, with some T/F and MCs.
reviews.comment_workload: The heaviest workload is to make cheat sheets before the exams, so the overall workload is light. All the homework can be done in an hour
